00041 /******************************************************************************
00042                     Types section
00043 ******************************************************************************/
00044 typedef struct PACK
00045 {
00046   uint16_t appId                         : 3;
00047   uint16_t alsoUnicast                   : 1;
00048   uint16_t alsoDerivedGroup              : 1;
00049   uint16_t alsoCommissionedGroup         : 1;
00050   uint16_t securityLevel                 : 2;
00051   uint16_t securityKeyType               : 3;
00052   uint16_t rxAfterTx                     : 1;
00053   uint16_t gpTxQueueFull                 : 1;
00054   uint16_t bidirectionalCapability       : 1;
00055   uint16_t proxyInfoPresent              : 1;
00056   uint16_t reserved                      : 1;
00057 }zgpGpNotificationOptions_t;
00058 
00059 // GP commissioning notification command
00060 typedef struct PACK
00061 {
00062   uint16_t appId                         : 3;
00063   uint16_t rxAfterTx                     : 1;
00064   uint16_t securityLevel                 : 2;
00065   uint16_t securityKeyType               : 3;
00066   uint16_t securityProcFailed            : 1;
00067   uint16_t bidirectionalCapability       : 1;
00068   uint16_t proxyInfoPresent              : 1;
00069   uint16_t reserved                      : 4;
00070 }zgpGpCommNotifyOptions_t;
00071 
00072 typedef struct PACK
00073 {
00074   union
00075   {
00076     zgpGpNotificationOptions_t notifyOptions;
00077     zgpGpCommNotifyOptions_t commNotifyOptions;
00078   }options;
00079   ZGP_GpdId_t  gpdId;
00080   uint8_t  endpoint;
00081   uint32_t  gpdSecurityFrameCounter;
00082   uint8_t  gpdCmdId;
00083   uint8_t  gpdCmdPayload[MAX_PAYLOAD_BY_GPD];
00084   uint16_t gppShortAddr;
00085   uint8_t  gppGpdLink;
00086   uint32_t  mic;
00087 } ZGP_GpNotification_t;
00088 
00089 typedef struct
00090 {
00091   APS_AddrMode_t      addrMode;     
00092   APS_Address_t       addr;         
00093   ShortAddr_t         aliasSrcAddr;   
00094   NwkSequenceNumber_t aliasSeqNumber; 
00095   uint8_t             radius;         
00096   uint8_t             cmdDir;         //Client/Server Direction
00097   uint8_t             cmdId;          //cmdId of ZclCmd
00098 } ZGP_Addressing_t;
